content: kool ridges crochet hat yarn used red heart super saver bernat premium or any # 4 worsted yarn crochet hook size 4 5 mm or 7 us ps this pattern is written for right handed crochet abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch or sls = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet sts or st = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side chain = chain blo = back loop only fpdc = front post double_crochet ps the hat is made from top down to the brim and worked in the round it s made for adult/teen female size but i ll indicate where you can make it for a child size if you want to make this for a man i would just go up hook size to a 5mm h or 5 5mm i as it does have a nice stretch and remember that yarn always stretches a little over time starting at the top of the hat going down row 1 in a magic_ring or chain 4 and sls chain 2 does not count as a stitch & make 10 double_crochet into the ring sls to top of the 1st double_crochet pull the circle tight = 10 sts row 2 chain 3 does not count as a st make 2 double_crochet in each st and sls to the 1st double_crochet = 20 sts row 3 ch1 at the beginning of each row will not count as a stitch **make 2 fpdc in the nxt stitch make 1 half_double_crochet blo in the next stitch ** repeat ** to ** to the end & sls to the top of 1st fpdc = 20 fpdc + 10 half_double_crochet = 30 sts ps it might seem a little hard or weird but you can put 2 front post double_crochet onto the same stitch what it looks like after row 3 is done row 4 chain 1 **make 1 fpdc in the nxt 2 fpdc from previous row make 2 half_double_crochet blo in the half_double_crochet from previous row repeat ** to ** to the end & sls to the top of the 1st fpdc = 20 fpdc + 20 half_double_crochet = 40 sts row 5 chain 1 **make 1 fpdc in the nxt 2 fpdc from previous row make 2 half_double_crochet blo in the next st and 1 half_double_crochet blo in the next st ** repeat ** to ** the end and sls to the top of the 1st fpdc = 20 fpdc + 30 half_double_crochet = 50 sts row 6 ch1 **make 1 fpdc in the nxt 2 fpdc from previous row make 1 half_double_crochet blo in the next 3 sts ** repeat ** to ** to the end & sls to the top of the 1st fpdc = 20 fpdc + 30 half_double_crochet = 50 sts no increases in this row row 7 chain 1 **make 1 fpdc in the nxt 2 fpdc from previous row make 1 half_double_crochet blo in the next 2 sts make 2 half_double_crochet
